name: Melody Stringer

text:

name: Mark Smiles
text: Some of the best carry out or eat in pizza to be found in Delaware!  I love their CHICKEN FRESCO pizza (grilled chicken, bacon, onions, sliced tomatoes,  signature sauce and three-cheese blend, plus cheddar).  Their pizza crust is a step ‚Ä¶More

text: Our family loves this place.  Great food and a great staff.  Highly recommend the old world pepperoni.  Delicious!

text: Marco's Pizza went above and beyond for me today!  I needed an itemized receipt from April and even though they had changed systems, the manager and employees went back through the old system, found my receipt after much trial and error, ‚Ä¶More

text: Great food! The staff is on point and very pleasant to talk to even during busy times they go out their way to talk and greet you.

name: Sara Kilpatrick
text: Best "fast food" pizza, especially for v the value. This store in particular does a nice job.

name: Amy Simpson
text: This is the cleanest pizza place in town and it has the BEST cheesy bread.

name: Ray Waters
text: Terrible experience.   Paid a ridiculous $37 for a medium pepperoni pizza, sub,breadsticks and salad.   They were more than happy to take my full priced order but when they forgot to deliver part of it "graciously" gave us our delivery fee ‚Ä¶More

name: Corey Taylor
text: I made my order online. I had wings and a sub .I ordered anchovies (which I order from Marcos Because you are the few that have them) and sausage (which I think you have the best). Neither if which where on it. And when I called I asked ‚Ä¶More

text: Quite frankly Marcos has been amazing, this location is always friendly and very clean! I was alittle nervous coming here but I have to say I am blown away by the professionalism and courtesy of the staff as well as the absolutely fantastic ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Beyer
text: The best pizza in all of Delaware! Cant beat the taste and the service.  One of the only places that still makes fresh dough and it makes a huge difference! For all of my pizza needs I will be going to Marcos!

name: Randy Keeler
text: The food, hands down, is some of the best I've had in Delaware without a doubt. Sadly they've lost my business, however, a s just this  evening I called and was put on hold for more than 10 minutes before I gave up and called Donatos. This is the second time in a row it's happened. Food is great but the customer service is garbage.

text:

name: martha holbrook
text: Ordered a steak and cheese sub with NO mayo and add green peppers mushrooms onions and tomatoes. Got a plain sub drowned in mayo. Waited an hour for it. Bad service. I gave you a second chance and you blew it. I guess the only way to get good service is if you are a regular.
